# kCTLanguageAttributeName

**Global Variable**

The name of the text language.

## Declaration

```swift
let kCTLanguageAttributeName: CFString
```

## Discussion

The value of this attribute must be a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFString] containing a language identifier conforming to [http://unicode.org/reports/tr35/]. The default is unset. When this attribute is set to a valid identifier, it will be used to select localized glyphs (if supported by the font), and locale-specific line-breaking rules.
